welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Les Mureaux, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
